title: Definition of a Type I error
text: The decision is to reject $$H_0$$ when, in fact, $$H_0$$ is true.

title: Definition of a Type II error
text: The decision is not to reject $$H_0$$ when, in fact, $$H_0$$ is false

title: Interpretation of the Problem
text: The students assumed that the null hypothesis was true, when it was not.

title: What Type of Error Are the Students Making?
text: The students are making a Type II error.
